channel.title: Changing Max Stat
channel.description: Hey, I have searched the tutorial area for a tutorial on how to change mage combat level to 126 and combat level to 99. It isn't there. Can anybody tell me how to do this please.

item.title: Changing Max Stat
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

Well friend. You see … you lost me in there. I started reading it and didn’t come back out for a week lol but thanks for your help. I will try.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Max Stat
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Wow, you’re using proper grammar and spelling

Please click this link: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/
and learn the basics of java, study your server a bit, then come back.

I’m assuming you’re using a wL-based server, so iirc there is a variable named ‘combat’ in the Player class and an array of player skills. Just define their values as whatever you want.

Read full topic
